title: The League of Nations: the first experiment
creator_credit: George Movshon and United Nations Television
brief_description: Described as, by the titles, “An account of the first attempt by nations to build an organisation to maintain the peace.” Contains original footage from WWI re the armistice and political accounts of movements during the war.
